meanings.definition: The period of time leading up to menopause in women, typically characterized by hormonal changes and symptoms such as hot flashes and irregular periods.
meanings.sent1: During perimenopauses, women may experience sudden hot flashes.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often discuss the symptoms of perimenopauses with their patients.
meanings.sent3: The perimenopauses seemed to play a game of hide-and-seek with her, surprising her with symptoms at unexpected times.
meanings.sent4: The journey through perimenopauses felt like a rollercoaster ride of hormonal changes.
meanings.sent5: The vivid dreams she had during perimenopauses made her nights eventful.
